DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness dextroamphetamine help methamphetamine user quit cut use . The study last 9 week . Eligible participant attend research visit twice per week , receive individual counseling session per week 9 week . 50 % participant receive active medication 50 % receive placebo ( sugar pill ) . Neither participant study team know participant receive placebo active drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Trial Dextroamphetamine Methamphetamine Dependence
DOC.criteria: 1850 yr . old pregnant lactating female Contact site additional information
